page.title: 08DUNDONALD _ A TYPICAL FAMILY
page.content: There are 5 in our family.We all wake up at 7.30am.My big brother goes out to school at 8.15am.He goes to Marr College in Troon.Troon is 5 miles away so he has to catch the bus.There are 3 different buses at 3 different times.Our school starts in the morning at 9.00am.We get a break at 10.30am till 10.45am and our lunch time is at 12.15pm till 1.25pm.We usually come back to school at 1.00pm so we can have a game of something in the playground.The end of lunch time is at 1.25pm and we go back into school until the home_time bell rings at 3.25pm.We go home and do our homework which is usually either Maths or Language and Spelling.Then we get changed and go out to play till tea time which is about 5.30pm.After tea in the summer we can go out to play again or in winter we watch T.V.
